title: Please help me figure out this font.
content:
Thanks for your help.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [MGM\_Grand-front1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=MGM_Grand-front1.jpg) | 27.79 KB |
author: bessd1

comments.content:
No, it doesn’t look anything like the Buler font to me. See…

[http://www.theretroworld.com/bulergrad.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128213336/http:/www.theretroworld.com/bulergrad.html)

It’s close, but no cigar: [Dot2Dot](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128213336/http:/www.abstractfonts.com/fonts/search/full_listing.htm?kw=dot2dot)

And it’s _Bueler_, as in Ferris!

\>And it’s Bueler, as in Ferris!

Close but no cigar it’s…

Bueller  
 [http://www.imdb.com/find?q=Bueller;s=all](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128213336/http:/www.imdb.com/find?q=Bueller;s=all)

;-)
